p: In this study, the effect of dichloromethane leaf extracts of Barringtonia asiatica against the DPPH radical scavenging was evaluated as shown in Table 2. The extract showed an appreciable DPPH scavenging activity compared to the test control. The scavenge 50% of the radical (IC 50) values of Barringtonia asiatica and that of vitamin C were exhibited to be 13.34 μg/mL and 10.66 μg/mL, respectively.
